list.abs: the allure of the one-night stand may be greater than that of any other sexual escapade in our culture .吸引力的一夜情可能大于任何其他的性越轨行为在我们的文化。
the press had a field day with the passport escapade , and Al Gore called it a McCarthyite abuse of power .媒体对护照风波这样的大肆宣扬，艾尔.戈尔称之为“麦卡锡主义般的权力滥用”。
join Sour Sally on her wonderful escapade . dive right into the delicious world of yoghurt and explore things fun and tasty .加入她美妙的恶作剧酸莎莉。潜入酸奶美味的权利和探索世界的乐趣和美味的东西。
he always embellishes his romantic escapades .他总是大肆渲染他的风流韵事。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'an escape'): from French, from Provençal or Spanish, from escapar 'to escape', based on medieval Latin ex- 'out of' + cappa 'cloak'. Compare with escape

entry.tran: 大胆冒险之举;恶作剧；惊险刺激的事
entry.def: An escapade is an exciting and rather dangerous adventure.

example.tran: 罗宾汉大胆冒险的那一幕

means.word_mean: 1. a wild and exciting undertaking (not necessarily lawful)
